author: terencechain
content:
I'm testing out prysm with https://github.com/mdehoog/go-ethereum. One CL and one EL combo. Post deneb fork, the `ExecutionPayload` returned from the above geth fork seems off. The `StateRoot` field is always empty. cc <@898563924440543283> <@159152274659082240> 

Any CL team tested local interop with the geth above?

author: roberto.bayardo
content: Thx, we might want to hold off on too much testing until my PR merging upstream is in but tomorrow I can take a look at this specific concern.
